name: Add new rows to a Google Sheets spreadsheet when PomoDoneApp timers stop
description:
Every time a PomoDoneApp timer is stopped, Make will automatically create a new row in Google Sheets spreadsheet.

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1a--nzKbNa7igS2twB3a_3v5Mwmn_UYNOBwClZ9ZNg6s/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.
